mapper.select: select * from tblmember order by m_id limit ${pageAmount} offset ${(pageNum - 1) * pageAmount}
mapper.insert: insert into tblmember (m_id, m_passwd, m_name) values (#{m_id}, hex(aes_encrypt(#{m_passwd}, sha2('202200309', 512))), #{m_name})
mapper.update: update tblmember set m_name = #{m_name}, m_passwd = hex(aes_encrypt(#{m_passwd}, sha2('202200309', 512))) where m_id = #{m_id}
